Class TA

  • java.lang.Object
    • taAllocation.Entity
      • taAllocation.TA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class TA
extends Entity
    Creates a TA object, extends Entity so it is named.
    Author:
    Kristopher Maxwell, Charles Cote, Arthur Simon, Florent Duffez
